lead_paragraph: Salvador Perez signed a club-friendly deal with the Royals four years ago in part so his mother, Yilda, would no longer have to work in their increasingly violent hometown in Venezuela.

headline.print_headline: Royals, Perez Agree to Deal Adding $52.5M Through 2021
headline.main: Royals, Perez Agree to Deal Adding $52.5M Through 2021
